firm-ai-hardening.title: Firm Refactor & AI Debt Awareness Hardening
firm-ai-hardening.instruction_raw: Implement the changes specified in the MISSION_spec to decouple Firm components and harden AI debt awareness.

market-systems-hardening.title: Market Precision & Robustness Hardening
market-systems-hardening.instruction_raw: Implement the MISSION_spec to fix unsafe quantization and robustify firm_id parsing.

finance-purity-refactor.title: Finance Protocol Purity Refactor
finance-purity-refactor.instruction_raw: Implement the MISSION_spec to refactor MonetaryTransactionHandler to use strict Protocols.
